A

addFirstMenuOptionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for the first option in the menu that appears after right clicking the image.
addHelpButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener to the help button.
addKeyboardListener(KeyListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for keyboard input.
addMouseClickListener(MouseListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a mouse click listener to the frame.
addMouseWheelListener(MouseWheelListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for mouse wheel events.
addNextButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for the next button.
addPreviousButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for the previous button.
addSecondMenuOptionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
Adds a listener listening for the second option in the menu that appears after right clicking the image.
